DOC.brief_summary: This study intend collect safety effectiveness data Cook Micronized Small Intestinal Submucosa ( SIS )
DOC.brief_title: Cook Micronized Small Intestinal Submucosa ( SIS ) Critical Limb Ischemia
DOC.criteria: Rutherford stage 4 5 LericheFontaine classification IIIB Patient unable treat endovascular surgical mean Patient pregnant breastfeeding Patient previous surgery within 30 day study procedure Patient plan surgical interventional procedure within 30 day study procedure Patient life expectancy le 1 year Patient known allergy pig pig product , religious cultural objection use pig tissue . Additional restriction specify protocol
